permissions: Admins can update inspections. Non-admins can update inspections if they are the inspection creator on a persisted record, a member of the broker tied to the inspection, a member of the customer tied to the inspection with permission to view the job production plan, a manager member of the job production plan developer, a job production plan inspector, or the driver on the tender job schedule shift when the job production plan expects an inspection.
validation_notes: Requires <id> argument (inspection ID). At least one of --status, --strategy, or --note must be provided; otherwise the command errors. Status accepts: open, closed. Strategy accepts: delivery_site_personnel. The model requires status to be present. Delivery site must be a JobSite or MaterialSite and must match the trip destination.
